name: INListRideOptionsIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for fetching the list of rides currently available from your ride-booking service.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INListRideOptionsIntent, completion: (INListRideOptionsIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that you can provide the list of ride options.

items.name: func handle(intent: INListRideOptionsIntent, completion: (INListRideOptionsIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles providing the list of ride options.
